ec
----
    import "gitlab.gz.cvte.cn/research_engineer/kit/ec"

kit/ec是错误处理库，基于`github.com/pkg/errors`包，增加对错误状态码status的支持，兼容`github.com/pkg/errors`


该 ec 包相关的使用可参考：(ec/example_test.go)

usage and examples
------------------

see ec/example_test.go for example and useage.

contributing
------------

We welcome pull requests, bug fixes and issue reports.
